get.summary: Search PRO terms.
get.description: Gets a list of PRO terms and associated information.

200.description: status=OK. Returns a list of PRO terms.

400.description: status=Bad Reqeust. The specified PRO ID is invalid.

404.description: status=Not Found. A PRO term with the specified ID was not found.

get.summary: Return PRO terms by IDs.
get.description: Gets PRO terms and associated information.

200.description: status=OK. Returns a PRO term.

400.description: status=Bad Reqeust. The specified PRO ID is invalid.

404.description: status=Not Found. A PRO term with the specified ID was not found.

get.summary: Returns a list of modified protein forms.
get.description: Gets a list of modified protein forms and associated information.

200.description: status=OK. Returns a list of PRO terms

404.description: status=Not Found. No modified protein form was found.

get.summary: Returns annotations for the given PRO ID(s).
get.description: Gets annotations for the given PRO ID(s).

200.description: status=OK. Returns annotations for the given PRO ID(s)

400.description: status=Bad Reqeust. The specified PRO ID is invalid.

404.description: status=Not Found. No annotation was found.

get.summary: Returns PRO term in OBO format for the given PRO ID(s).
get.description: Gets PRO term in OBO format for the given PRO ID(s).

200.description: status=OK. Returns PRO term in OBO format for the given PRO ID

400.description: status=Bad Reqeust. None of the specified PRO IDs is valid.

404.description: status=Not Found. No PRO term was found.

idsParam.name: proIds
idsParam.description: PRO ID(s). Space separated values accepted up to 100.

offsetParam.name: Offset
offsetParam.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

limitParam.name: Limit
limitParam.description: The numbers of items to return.

searchFieldParam.name: searchField
searchFieldParam.description: Search field that needs to be considered for filter

searchParam.name: searchValue
searchParam.description: any string or "null" or "not null" or a list of space separated ids
